dict.acceptation: 治疗，疗法；处理；待遇，对待；

sent.orig: Three biological treatment methods have been investigated, including aerobic treatment, anaerobic treatment and yeasts treatment.
sent.trans: 试验分别利用三种生物处理方法：好氧、厌氧及酵母菌处理方法对稠油废水进行了处理。

sent.orig: Decontamination increases water treatment costs, the sewage treatment business growth, mainly from sewage treatment rates improve.
sent.trans: 除污水处理费的调增以外，污水处理业务的成长性主要来自污水处理率的提高。

sent.orig: Conventional wastewater treatment methods mainly are biological treatment apparatus. Among them is secondary activated treatment technology.
sent.trans: 传统的污水处理采用生物处理方法的居多，其中以二级活性污泥法为主。

sent.orig: The hemorheology were improved evidently in pre-treatment and post treatment in treatment group (P<0.05).
sent.trans: 治疗组治疗后血液流变学改善也较对照组明显(P<0.05)。

sent.orig: This treatment include natural plant aromatherapy and a double mask treatment to increase treatment results.
sent.trans: 此疗程包含植物香薰的双重特效面膜，可使护理效果增倍。
